attributes.action: Introduce a law forcing petrol prices to track the price of crude oil
attributes.additional_details: Oil companies are too slow to pass on price drops, most of the time they don't pass on price drops at all. Only a law can force this upon the oil companies
attributes.background: Introduce this change into UK law immediately

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282
